channel.title: Resources for learning Linux - David Vargas
channel.description: Going Down the Linux Rabbit Hole Now that I have finished my CCNA, it’s time to go down the Linux rabbit hole. I may or may not be getting any Linux certifications. I mostly just want a foundation of basic Linux and bash scripting skills. This will help expand the areas of technology that I am able to work with. After searching Reddit and asking professionals on Discord, these are the beginner friendly resources for learning Linux that I came up with.
